Order Authorizing Joint Administration of the Debtors' Chapter 11 Cases: 08-12605 through 08-12629. An order has been entered in this case consolidating this case with the case of VeraSun Energy Corporation, Case No. 08-12606 (BLS), for procedural purposes only and providing for its joint administration in accordance with the terms thereof. The docket in Case No. 08-12606 (BLS) should be consulted for all matters affecting this case. (Related Doc # 3) Order Signed on 11/3/2008. (LCN) (Entered: 11/03/2008)
